headline: Carrier Global’s Quiet Dividend Strategy Deserves Attention
summary: Carrier Global Corporation (NYSE: CARR) distributed $0.24 per share to investors on February 9, 2026, marking a 6.7% increase from the prior quarterly rate of $0.225. The payment arrives as the HVAC manufacturer navigates contrasting business dynamics: residential exposure creating near-term headwinds while commercial HVAC and data center wins drive future momentum. Dividend Sustainability: Strong ... Carrier Global’s Quiet Dividend Strategy Deserves Attention
